founders_note: Like many couples, we found ourselves stuck in a cycle of Netflix and takeout for our date nights. We realized that most couples face two common date night hurdles: The struggle to break free from routine and find fresh ideas The challenge of planning something special amidst busy lives As a couple ourselves, we decided to solve this. That's why we created Ignight - to give couples like us an instant spark for memorable date nights We've now helped thousands of couples rediscover the joy of quality time together. We'd love for you to join us in making every date night an adventure.
